<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13); any good alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.

</column>

---

You are dedicated to the cause of the Shining Sentinels. You gain expert proficiency in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13). When you are between an ally and a foe and would provide lesser cover to your ally against the foe’s attacks, you twist to become even more obtrusive, providing standard cover instead.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Knight Vigilant archetype.

<title level="2">Knight Vigilant leads to...</title>
[Aegis of Arnisant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1095), [Divine Healing](/Feats.aspx?ID=3577), [Emissary of Peace](/Feats.aspx?ID=3580), [Empyreal Aura](/Feats.aspx?ID=3587), [Endure Death's Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=1094), [Guarded Advance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3583), [Instant Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=3581), [Instinctual Interception](/Feats.aspx?ID=3585), [Interrupt Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3578), [Keep up the Good Fight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3586), [Knight in Shining Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=1096), [Lead the Way](/Feats.aspx?ID=3582), [Phalanx Formation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3579), [Stalwart Standard](/Feats.aspx?ID=3620), [Tower Shield Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=3588), [Unshakable Idealism](/Feats.aspx?ID=1093), [Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2169), [Vigilant Benediction](/Feats.aspx?ID=3584)
